> <OLD>
>
> PErceptor scanned Nighlight and said =93Her body is all right, =
she can
fuction by herself as soon as we bring her back her coma... it=92s =
the mind
that worry me=94and add dryly=94this will be your part of the job,=
 Rodimus: when
I remove the stasis, she will awake and you will be there...=
 I want to check
her reaction to... Someone that she is attached of; if all=
 works all right,
she will remember you and we can evaluate her mind... In =
the worse case
scenario, we have to subdue her and set her in statis one mo=
re time... I
dont like that idea, but is for her own safely and ours=94a d =
he added =94Tell
when you are ready=94

<NEW>

Rodimus, who had not taken h=
is optics off of Nightlight since he had entered
the room just nodded to Pe=
rceptor. He sat down next to Nightlight, placing
his hands on one of hers, =
taking it into his own.

His face was both sad and yet concerned. Would she=
 know him or remember him?
It was as if an eternity had passed since they h=
ad really been able to spend
any time together. The last time he had seen h=
er she really had not
remembered him, at least not completely. He wondered =
now if he would be any
help at all. But he knew that no matter what, he wou=
ld be here for her.

> <OLD>
>
> Quickstride heads to Rodimus but is carefu=
l not to be too noisy.
>
> "Sir, Straight Shot and I are working in Tucson'=
s lab now, and before we
can start, we need to get a geographical layout of=
 the surrounding
parameter. It appears we need a high peak of some sort to =
carry the weight
of the wind mill structure. It would hide the device from =
harm, and
basically keep the environment the same without harming it. I'm g=
oing to
send some mini probes out there to photograph the area. Once I get =
those
back, I'll be able to draw up something."
>

(OOC: Please keep in min=
d that Tuscon=92s old lab and Wheeljack=92s room will be
sized for full siz=
ed TF=92s. Tuscon and the rest have all been resized /
reformatted for BW=
=92s sized characters. They will be much too small for most
of the tools to=
 be used easily.)

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded to Straight Shot but continued to =
look at Nightlight. =93Do
what you can.=94 He said to her. =93Check with Le=
gacy if you need any
assistance.=94

A call came in over his radio from Nig=
ht Shift, and he sent back a quick
response. He glanced over at Ramulus, =
=93Nightshift and Rat Trap are looking
for Cheetor. See who is available to=
 give them a hand.=94

Ramulus nodded as he turned to leave the room. He gl=
anced at Straight shot .
. .

Rodimus on the other hand looked at Perceptor=
 and nodded, =93I am ready. He
turned to face his wife again, all thoughts =
of the missions and the Ark as
he was concerned for her.

(TAG)

Preston

--0016e65cb64ed80e7d04a32caf3b
